Articles.Content: So I found out you can climb the flagpoles at the KSC. Sorry I don't have pictures, but I can never get them to work anyways. Basically, just walk up to either the launch pad flagpole or the astronaut complex one and then itll give you the option to climb it. If someone can post pictures of this that'd be great.
It was possible in 0.21 (haven't played before..)
I wont bother posting a picture, but it's perfectly possible
Why haven't I ever thought of this?! It's a perfect closeup vantage point for watching rockets liftoffs.
